statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE id = 1 AND bytes_transferred > 1000;
DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND port = 80 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suspicious_activity WHERE event_type = 'DDoS Attack';
DELETE FROM suspicious_activity WHERE event_type = 'DDoS Attack' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Network_Traffic_Data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND data_size > 1000
DELETE FROM Suspicious_Activity_Logs WHERE severity_level >= 3 AND activity_description LIKE '%virus%'
